channel.description: Recent content in Ruben Studdard on Music

item.title: Ruben Studdard - Meant To Be
item.description:
Just take a look at
who we are
What do you
see?
Let’s try to
work it out
Talk about
figure out
If there’s a new
you and me
When we have love
for ourselves
Only then can we love
someone else
If we make a vow
we will be
All that we’re
meant to be yeah yeah
There was
a time
When I thought
I had lost it all
But you stood
by my side
There to guide
gave me pride
You stopped
my fall
When it hurt to
get through my day
You were strong and
you showed me the way
That we hold the key
we can be
All that we’re
meant to be
Now that my heart is
so free
You know I feel
your love all over me
You shine a light
through darkness
Now I can see
you gave me hope
When I was on the road
all alone
And when I was
feeling down
You picked me up
brushed me off
You helped me
move on
Now I have a love
for myself
So it’s time to love
someone else
‘Cause we
hold the key
We can be
more than we ever
Fantasized
with open eyes
We’ll
realize
That we hold the key
we can be
All that we’re
meant to be
(All that
we’re meant
All that we’re meant)
to be
We can be who we
want to be y’all
If we just believe
believe that we can be
All that we’re
meant to be

item.title: Ruben Studdard - Flying Without Wings
item.description:
Everybody’s looking
for that something
One thing that makes
it all complete
You find it in the
strangest places
Places you never
thought it could be
Some find it
in the faces
Of their
children
Some find it in
their lovers eyes
Who can deny
the joy it brings
When you find
that special thing
You’re flying
without wings
Some find it sharing
every morning
Some in their
solitary lives
You find it in the
words of others
A simple line
can make you
Laugh
or cry
You find it in the
deepest friendships
The kind you cherish
all your life
And when you know
how much that means
You’ve found
that special thing
You’re flying
without wings
So impossible
as it may seem
You’ve got to fight
for every dream
‘Cause who’s
to know
Which one
you let go
Would have
made you complete
Well for me it’s
waking up beside you
To watch the sunrise
on your face
To know that I can say
I love you
At any given
time or place
It’s little the things
that only I know
Those are the things
that make you mine
And it’s like
flying without wings
‘Cause you’re
my special thing
I’m flying
without wings
You’re the place
my life begins
And you’ll be
where it ends
I’m flying
without wings
And that’s the
joy you bring
I’m flying
without wings

item.title: Ruben Studdard - How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
item.description:
I can think of
younger days
When living
for my life
Was everything
a man could want to do
I could never
see tomorrow
I was never told
about the sorrow
And how can you
mend a broken heart
How can you stop the
rain from falling down
Tell me how
can you stop
The sun
from shining
What makes the world
go round
Oh how can you mend
this broken man
How can a loser
ever win
Please help me mend
(my broken)
My broken heart
and let me
Live again
(la la la la la)
I can still feel
the breeze
That rustles
through the trees
And misty memories
of days gone by
We could never
see tomorrow
No one said a word
about the sorrow woo
(How can you mend)
how can you mend
(A broken heart)
a broken heart
How can you stop the
rain from falling down
Please tell me
how can you stop
Stop the sun
from shining
What makes
the world go round
Oh la la la la
la la la la
Oh how can a loser
ever win
Please help me mend
mend my broken heart
And let me
live again
Listen baby
(how can you mend)
How can you mend
(a broken heart)
How can you stop the
rain from falling down
Won’t you
please help me
My broken heart
and let me
Live again
baby~

item.title: Ruben Studdard - Superstar
item.description:
Long ago
and oh so far away
I fell in love
with you
Before the second show
and your guitar
And you sound
so sweet and clear
But you’re not
really here
It’s just
the radio
Don’t you remember
you told me
You love me baby
you said
You’d be coming back
this way again
Baby baby baby baby
oh baby
I love you
I really do
Loneliness
is such a sad affair
Sad affair
and I can’t
Hardly wait
baby no I can’t
To be with you again
but what to say
To say to make you
come again
Oh honey come on
back to me again uh
I wanna be I wanna be
anywhere you are oh
Don’t you remember
you told me
You love me baby
you said
You’d be coming back
this way again
Babe babe babe
baby baby baby baby
Oh baby
I love you oh baby
Don’t you remember
you told me
You love me baby
you said
You’d be coming back
this way again
Baby baby baby baby
oh baby
I love you
I really do
